title: Oval Marble Top Coffee Table with Fluted Wood Storage & Gold Legs | Mid-Century Modern Living Room Accent Table
description:
Elevate your living space with this sophisticated oval coffee table, blending timeless elegance with practical design. Featuring a luxurious white marble top, it rests gracefully upon a warm, dark wood base with stylish fluted detailing. The innovative design includes two discreet storage compartments perfect for keeping your living area tidy. Supported by sleek, tapered gold-finish metal legs, this table offers a touch of mid-century modern charm and contemporary functionality. Ideal for any stylish home, it's perfect for entertaining or daily use.

Features:
  • Elegant oval white marble tabletop
  • Rich dark wood base with distinctive fluted accents
  • Integrated storage compartments for a clutter-free space
  • Sturdy tapered gold-finish metal legs
  • Perfect blend of mid-century modern and contemporary aesthetics
furniture_finish: Walnut Wood Finish, Polished Marble, Gold Metal Finish
